#

12 Years  

Bourbon Street Bartending has serivced over 1000 events since our inception in
2007.

Bourbon Street is fully licensed and insured in both the Cincinnati and
Birmingham markets.  Bartenders are trained professionals  

An impeccable record means, venues, caterers and event coordinators recommend
BSB more than any other bar service

Cincinnati Metro area and Birmingham metro's most comprehesive beverage
service.  We supply the bartenders, the alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages
and portable bars.  Bartending an event  requires your full attention and
using inexperience bartenders risks the success of the entire event.  From
serving poorly prepared drinks to over-serving guests, a good bartender is
worth the investment.  Bourbon Street Bartending uses only professional
bartenders well versed in creating your favorite drinks and also can recommend
new drinks you and your guests can enjoy.  We are a licensed and fully insured
beverage  company.  From Weddings, Corporate events, private parties and fund
raisers, we are the most trusted mobile bartending services in the area.  

##

Welcome to Bourbon Street Bartending

Bourbon Street Bartending has an establishment in Hamilton Ohio from this
locaton we service the Cincinnati, Dayton and Northern Kentucky Markets.  

  

Bourbon Street Bartending also is established in Pinson Alabama, from this
location we service the Birmingham, Hoover and Huntsville Markets.
